post:
I'm looking for a provider who is willing to provide a CentOS VPS for at most 2 weeks. I want to test some code for the [Ansible project](http://ansible.cc), specificly the system upgrade code for the yum module.

Except for that it should run CentOS 5 (and then 6) and at least 256MB ram the rest does not matter. (Xen, openvz, disk, bw etc).
